Flow.description: Updates based on Jaco's spreadsheet v2
Flow.label: Global - Case Notifications

value.stringValue: This is a reminder to please review this case and accept or decline it on behalf of your firm.
This case is now in negotiation. You can now update offers and upload supporting documents.
Please note that your team has been assigned to a new case.
You have been assigned to facilitate case "& [Case_Notification__c].Case__c &".
Please note that the Unilateral Referral period has started, which means the merit and/or loss items can now be referred for arbitration without the consent from the counterparty.
Please review (accept/decline) items that were referred/reviewed for arbitration by "& [Case_Notification__c].Defendant_Firm__c &".

Please note that negotiation will end in "& Doc_Prep_Prior_Notification__c &" days, after which the merit (if unresolved) and all unresolved loss items will automatically be submitted for arbitration.
Please note that the Doc Prep period has started, which means both parties have an opportunity to submit any documents for arbitral reviewal.
Please note that Doc Prep will end in X days, after which no additional documents can be submitted for arbitral reviewal.
Case [case number] - Doc Prep window closing in X (2) days
Please note that the Final Offers period has started, which means both parties have an opportunity to try to settle with a final offer in an effort to avoid arbitration.
Please note that Final Offers will end in X days, after which all arbitral items will then be arbitrated.
Case "& [Case_Notification__c].Case__c &" - Final Offer window closing in X (2) days
Please assign the appropriate team to the case.
This is a reminder to please assign the appropriate team to the case.
